alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Franklin; Jefferson; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 11 at 2:55AM CDT until June 10 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Louisiana and Mississippi, including the following areas and parishes, in northeast Louisiana, Catahoula, Concordia, Franklin LA, Madison LA, Richland and Tensas. In Mississippi, Adams, Claiborne, Franklin MS, Jefferson and Warren. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT this morning through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms resulting in heavy rainfall through this evening with rainfall amounts of 2-4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
